The Overlook Hotel

This app simulates a hotel website that lets customers view their past and upcoming trips, how much they've spent so far at the hotel, and also book rooms in the future. It was created by Brett Kuhn, a student at Turing School of Software and Design in Mod 2 of November 2022 - get started by using the navigation bar to the left.
